short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that launches sites you wanted to view later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never forget a bookmark again.

Click on the Better Bookmarks icon to save a bookmark you wish to view in 12 hours, 1 day, or 3 days. Better Bookmarks will launch your bookmark automatically once the specified time has elapsed.

If you have any trouble with the extension, you can contact me at blackmoniii.odell@gmail.com

Be sure to check out the Github repository to add your own features!
